text: Pickled walnuts are an English pickle, made from walnuts.Heath, Ambrose (Ed); Blanche Anding; Joan Robins (1957). Modern Home Cookery in Pictures. Odhams Press, London People say pickled walnuts work well with a plate of cold turkey or ham, or a blue cheese.Dorothy Hartley. Food in England. (1999) 672 pag. , The process for making pickled walnuts takes about a week. ==References== Category:Pickles
title: Pickled walnuts
